componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

I would like to take a moment to introduce our Packaging Experts who will be staffing booth #1311 at Labelexpo Americas 2022 in Chicago from September 13th to the 15th. They will be available to discuss our packaging product line (below), the march toward sustainability in the global Packaging market and discuss pain points and solutions.

We invite you to stop by and have a conversation with our in-house experts. If you are not attending the show, please feel free to connect with them.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Dan Riendeau - Strategic Business Unit Manager; Packaging

Dan is a Strategic Business Unit Manager for the Packaging market. Dan chairs the .............

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Melissa David - Product Line Manager; Packaging

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Lori Bitar - Pharmaceutical and Medical Device Application Expert

Lori is a Market Development Manager and sits as the Chair of AIM North America's Pharma Working Group. She has extensive knowledge in print technologies and product performance in the labeling sector. Lori is ready to share her knowledge to ensure the success of your pharmaceutical and medical device labeling applications.
